00025 class BtObexResponseCode
00026 {
00027     public:
00028         enum ResponseCode {
00029             // Success
00030             Success                     = 0x20,
00031             Continue                    = 0x10,
00032             PartialContent              = 0x26,
00033 
00034             // Error Codes
00035             BadRequest                  = 0x40,
00036             NotImplemented              = 0x51,
00037             Forbidden                   = 0x43,
00038             Unauthorised                = 0x41,
00039             PreconditionFailed          = 0x4C,
00040             NotFound                    = 0x44,
00041             NotAcceptable               = 0x46,
00042             ServiceUnavailable          = 0x53,
00043 
00044             // Unspecified error
00045             Unspecified                 = 0x7F
00046         };
00047 
00049         static inline BtObexResponseCode Ok();
00050 
00055         inline BtObexResponseCode(ResponseCode  obex_resp_code = Unspecified, BOOLEAN final_flag = FALSE);
00056 
00058         inline BtObexResponseCode(UINT8 obex_resp_code);
00059 
00061         inline BtObexResponseCode(const BtObexResponseCode &  from);
00062 
00064         inline BtObexResponseCode & operator=(const BtObexResponseCode &  from);
00065 
00067         inline BOOLEAN IsError() const;
00068 
00070         inline BOOLEAN IsOk() const;
00071 
00073         inline BOOLEAN IsFinal() const;
00074     
00076         inline BOOLEAN IsFinished() const;
00077 
00082         inline operator BOOLEAN() const;
00083 
00085         inline ResponseCode GetObexResponseCode() const;
00086 
00088         inline UINT8 GetObexResponseCodeByte() const;
00089 
00090     private:
00091         UINT8       m_obex_resp_code;   
00092 };
00093 
00094 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095     Ok
00096     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00097 BtObexResponseCode  BtObexResponseCode::Ok()
00098 {
00099     return  BtObexResponseCode(Success, TRUE);
00100 }// Ok
00101 
00102 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     BtObexResponseCode
00104     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00105 BtObexResponseCode::BtObexResponseCode(ResponseCode  obex_resp_code, BOOLEAN final_flag)
00106 {
00107     m_obex_resp_code = obex_resp_code;
00108 
00109     if (final_flag) {
00110         m_obex_resp_code = (ResponseCode)(m_obex_resp_code | 0x80);
00111     }
00112 }// BtObexResponseCode
00113 
00114 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00115     BtObexResponseCode
00116     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00117 BtObexResponseCode::BtObexResponseCode(UINT8 obex_response_code) :
00118     m_obex_resp_code(obex_response_code)
00119 {
00120 }// BtObexResponseCode
00121 
00122 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00123     BtObexResponseCode
00124     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00125 BtObexResponseCode::BtObexResponseCode(const BtObexResponseCode &  from) :
00126     m_obex_resp_code( from.m_obex_resp_code )
00127 {
00128 }// BtObexResponseCode
00129 
00130 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00131     operator=
00132     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00133 BtObexResponseCode &    BtObexResponseCode::operator=(const BtObexResponseCode &  from)
00134 {
00135     // Self - assignment doesn't hurt here, so we don't check for it !
00136     m_obex_resp_code = from.m_obex_resp_code;
00137     return *this;
00138 }// operator=
00139 
00140 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00141     IsError
00142     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00143 BOOLEAN BtObexResponseCode::IsError() const
00144 {
00145     return ((m_obex_resp_code & 0x7F) > 0x30);
00146 }// IsError
00147 
00148 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00149     IsOk
00150     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00151 BOOLEAN BtObexResponseCode::IsOk() const
00152 {
00153     return ((m_obex_resp_code & 0x7F) < 0x30);
00154 }// IsOk
00155 
00156 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00157     IsFinal
00158     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00159 BOOLEAN BtObexResponseCode::IsFinal() const
00160 {
00161     return (m_obex_resp_code & 0x80);
00162 }// IsOk
00163 
00164 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00165     operator BOOLEAN
00166     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00167 BOOLEAN BtObexResponseCode::IsFinished() const
00168 {
00169     return (GetObexResponseCode() != Continue);
00170 }
00171 
00172 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00173     operator BOOLEAN
00174     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00175 BtObexResponseCode::operator BOOLEAN() const
00176 {
00177     return IsOk();
00178 }// BOOLEAN
00179 
00180 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00181     GetObexResponseCode
00182     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00183 BtObexResponseCode::ResponseCode BtObexResponseCode::GetObexResponseCode() const
00184 {
00185     return (ResponseCode)(m_obex_resp_code & 0x7F);
00186 }// GetErrorCode
00187 
00188 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00189     GetObexResponseCodeByte
00190     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00191 UINT8 BtObexResponseCode::GetObexResponseCodeByte() const
00192 {
00193     return m_obex_resp_code;
00194 }// GetErrorCode
